item.description:
Let's keep the monthly Chicken Bone event alive!

The Racky Thomas Band is playing - from the looks of it they're a blues band.

Just a chill night to sit, eat, listen to some good music and people watch

Join us when you can - we've managed to grab tables together in the past and we will do our best to do the same this time.

The Chicken Bone
item.how_to_find_us: TBA - I will send out my number a day before the event so you can find us
item.why: If you enjoy a chill laid back night out without having to sit home alone, come join us
item.name: The Chicken Bone - Another night of music, drinks and food
